name: Carlos Pérez
bio: Carlos Pérez, a steadfast Center Back from Costa Rica, embodies resilience and tactical prowess on the pitch. Known for his towering presence and quick decision-making, he excels in intercepting passes and organizing the defense. Growing up amidst the lush landscapes of San José, his commitment to sustainability mirrors that of Tierra Alta FC, making him an invaluable asset both on and off the field.
